CREATE TABLE BOOK
  (
    B_ID     NUMBER (3) NOT NULL ,
    B_Author VARCHAR2 (60) NOT NULL ,
    B_TITLE  VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL ,
    B_ISBN   NUMBER (6) NOT NULL ,
    B_COUNT  NUMBER (3) NOT NULL ,    
    B_STATUS VARCHAR2 (50) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE BOOK ADD CONSTRAINT BOOK_PK PRIMARY KEY
(
  B_ID
)
;

CREATE TABLE Librarian
  (
    L_ID     NUMBER (3) NOT NULL ,
    L_USNAME VARCHAR2 (50) NOT NULL ,
    L_PASS   VARCHAR2 (6) NOT NULL ,
    L_FNAME  VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL ,
    L_LNAME  VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Librarian ADD CONSTRAINT Librarian_PK PRIMARY KEY
(
  L_ID
)
;

CREATE TABLE REPORTLOGS
  (
    R_ID   NUMBER (3) NOT NULL ,
    R_TYPE VARCHAR2 (30) NOT NULL ,
    R_Date DATE NOT NULL ,
    R_L_ID NUMBER (3) NOT NULL ,
    R_S_ID NUMBER (9) NOT NULL ,
    R_FINE NUMBER (3) ,
    R_B_ID number (3)
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE REPORTLOGS ADD CONSTRAINT REPORTLOGS_PK PRIMARY KEY
(
  R_ID
)
;

CREATE TABLE Students
  (
    S_ID     NUMBER (9) NOT NULL ,
    S_FName  VARCHAR2 (50) NOT NULL ,
    S_LNAME  VARCHAR2 (50) NOT NULL ,
    S_COURSE VARCHAR2 (80) NOT NULL ,
    S_PASS   VARCHAR2 (6) NOT NULL ,
    ID 	     NUMBER (3) NOT NULL
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE Students ADD CONSTRAINT Students_PK PRIMARY KEY
(
  S_ID
)
;

CREATE TABLE TRANSACTION
  (
    T_ID          NUMBER (3) NOT NULL ,
    T_BOR_DATE    DATE NOT NULL ,
    T_RET_DATE    DATE ,
    T_DUE_DATE    DATE NOT NULL ,
    T_FINE        NUMBER (3) ,
    T_FINE_STATUS VARCHAR2 (20) NOT NULL ,
    L_ID          NUMBER (3) ,
    B_ID          NUMBER (3) ,
    S_ID          NUMBER (9)
  ) ;
ALTER TABLE TRANSACTION ADD CONSTRAINT TRANSACTION_PK PRIMARY KEY
(
  T_ID
)
;

ALTER TABLE TRANSACTION ADD CONSTRAINT TRANSACTION_BOOK_FK FOREIGN KEY ( B_ID ) REFERENCES BOOK ( B_ID ) ;

ALTER TABLE TRANSACTION ADD CONSTRAINT TRANSACTION_Librarian_FK FOREIGN KEY ( L_ID ) REFERENCES Librarian ( L_ID ) ;

ALTER TABLE TRANSACTION ADD CONSTRAINT TRANSACTION_Students_FK FOREIGN KEY ( S_ID ) REFERENCES Students ( S_ID ) ;
